params.spender: Address that's allowed to send funds

returns._0: Returns boolean value true if succesfull
Returns boolean value true if succesfull

params.recipient: Address to send the funds to

returns._0: Returns boolean value true if succesfull

params.sender: Address to send the OCU tokens from

returns._0: Returns boolean value true if succesfull

params.to: Address to send the funds to

allowance.details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

balanceOf.details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

totalSupply.details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

Log(string,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Emitted when Ether is sent to the contract

approve(address,uint256).notice: ERC20 standard; Approve other acccount to send funds from the wallet

burn(uint256).notice: Burn OCU tokens with a Foundation wallet

distribute(address,uint256).notice: Gives 'distributer' roles ability to transfer tokens from Foundation wallet

mint(uint256).notice: Mint OCU tokens with a Foundation wallet

previewGrantRole().notice: Function added for preview purposes; Grants Foundation role to message sender

resumeContract().notice: Gives Foundation to resume distribution functionality

stopContract().notice: Gives Foundation ability to stop distribution functionality

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: ERC20 functionality; Transfer OCU tokens from wallet that gave permission to transfer funds

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Gives Foundation ability to withdraw Ether from contract

userdoc.notice: Allows individuals and enterprises to exchange value between ecosystem participants. This is an experimental contract.
